excerpt: Taken prisoner deep in German territory, Errol Flynn and Ronald Reagan lead a downed RAF bomber crew on an escape back to England.
title: Desperate Journey

excerpt: A mercenary team forces the only man who ever escaped a serial killer to lead them back into the killer’s trap-filled lair to rescue a wealthy businessman’s daughter.
title: The Collection

excerpt: A young man returns to the family sheep farm to find his older brother’s genetic experiments have turned the flock into bloodthirsty monsters.
title: Black Sheep

excerpt: A group of parapsychologists out to cleanse a haunted house fall prey to a murderous warlock’s spirit.
title: Witchtrap

excerpt: Bond trader Tom Hanks and mistress Melanie Griffith take a wrong turn into the South Bronx, hit a local kid, and flee—sparking a media circus fanned by alcoholic journalist Bruce Willis.
title: The Bonfire of the Vanities
